Sai-Bhajan.desc:
Sai Bhajans and Pravachan.
Sing aloud the glory of God and charge the atmosphere with divine adoration . . .

Time: 7:30 PM till 8:30 PM
When:Every Thursday

sundar_kand.desc:
Sundar Kand
Sundara Kanda, literally 'beautiful episode/book', is the fifth book in the Hindu epic the Ramayana.
Time: 03:00 PM till 05:00 PM
Suggested Donation: 25
Do you know?: Sundara Kanda is the only chapter of the Ramayana in which the hero is not Rama, but rather Hanuman.

Satya_narayana_puja.desc:
Sri Satyannarayana Puja
The Satyanarayan Puja is performed in reverence to the Narayan form of Lord Vishnu. The Lord in this form is considered an embodiment of truth.

Time: 06:30 PM till 08:00 PM
Interesting Fact: This puja is performed daily at a very ancient famous temple for Sri Satyanarayana Swamy at Annavaram, East Godavari dt, Andhra Pradesh
